name: cryptohybrid-bank
description: CryptoHybrid Bank - Comprehensive crypto-fiat banking platform

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:services
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm test || echo "frontend tests not configured"
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../tests && npm install
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "cd services/api-gateway && npm run dev" "cd services/user-service && npm run dev" "cd services/wallet-service && npm run dev" "cd services/payment-service && npm run dev" "cd services/card-service && npm run dev"
scripts.build:services: npm run build:api-gateway && npm run build:user-service && npm run build:wallet-service && npm run build:payment-service && npm run build:card-service
scripts.build:api-gateway: cd services/api-gateway && npm run build || echo "no build step"
scripts.build:user-service: cd services/user-service && npm run build || echo "no build step"
scripts.build:wallet-service: cd services/wallet-service && npm run build || echo "no build step"
scripts.build:payment-service: cd services/payment-service && npm run build || echo "no build step"
scripts.build:card-service: cd services/card-service && npm run build || echo "no build step"

author: CryptoHybrid Bank Team
